name: Nyanko's Mini Tower Defense
description:
Hiya! I've put off uploading this for some time since it's unfinished, but the source code was lost so it will  (likely) never get finished. Things to take note of:

  • You can move with WASD, and clicking throws an axe (costs essence).
  • Komiko Units (Costs 20 Essence) cannot be placed closed together.
  • Sales cannot be canceled, if you click a tower, you HAVE to place it.
  • The game is not endless, and the final wave (15) is DIFFICULT.
  • Unfortunately, the game force closes when you die :(

These are all things that would have been fixed or changed in a final version, but we may never see that. Regardless, I hope you all enjoy this micro tower defense!! I made this, art programming and all, start to finish in only a single night. I am very proud of it^^ Enjoy :D
